pages.text: $(mob)The Harvester$() is a boss that sometimes spawns on the surface of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. Its spawn is signaled by a thunder strike and its loud laughter. It floats arounds and can pass through walls. It attacks players on sight, either charging at them for a melee strike or standing still while summoning claws at its target's feet. The latter can be dodged by continually moving around.

$(mob)The Harvester$() drops $(item)The Harvester's Scythe$() on death. It is a durable melee weapon that can also be used as a tool. Whenever it is used to break grass or leaves, it will instantly clear a 7x3x7 area of other grass and leaves centered on the broken block.
